title: Rapid Blaster Deco
paragraphs: The Rapid Blaster Deco is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is the Deco-branded version of the Rapid Blaster.
The Rapid Blaster Deco is nearly identical in appearance to the Rapid Blaster. The only difference between the two is that the Rapid Blaster Deco has stickers bearing the Deco logo on the sides.
In Splatoon 3, the pink color that was present on the Rapid Blaster has been changed to blue.
The Rapid Blaster Deco comes in a set with Suction Bombs and the Bomb Rush.

The Rapid Blaster Deco was released on 27 January 2018 at 02:00 UTC.[2] It comes with Suction Bombs and the Inkjet.
- Rapid Blaster Deco back view
- Rapid Blaster Deco side view

The Rapid Blaster Deco returns in Splatoon 3 as of Fresh Season 2023. It functions the same as the normal Rapid Blaster but has a different kit and appearance. It has Deco arrow stickers on the sides and a blue color scheme, as opposed to the traditional red one. Its kit consists of Torpedo and Inkjet. The weapon was teased in the Fresh Season poster on 16 February 2023 and officially revealed on 21 February 2023. It released on 28 February 2023.

For competitive tips about the Rapid Blaster Deco
- The Rapid Blaster Deco is listed in the "Coming Soon" section of the Splatoon Prima Guide, even though it was available at launch. This could mean that it was originally intended to be a DLC item.

- In Splatoon 3, the Rapid Blaster have lights which illuminate when fired. But for some reason, these light-up parts on the Rapid Blaster Deco do not light up by any means. This issue is shared with the Rapid Blaster Pro Deco.
